name: Adrian Wei
title: Software Engineering Student @ Western University
summary: Software Engineering student graduating in 2027 with a strong foundation in C/C++ development, systems security, and full-stack applications. I have a passion for building innovative solutions that make a real impact.
bio_highlighted: I have experience developing with C++, Python, C#, Java, SQL, and .NET Core. My focus areas include Systems Security, Full-Stack Development, and AI Integration. I'm currently leading backend development for cybersecurity research tools at LeakSight.

education.degree: Bachelor of Engineering in Software Engineering
